comments.body:
Now that I think about it, we could eventually centralize this into agnhost as well. We have the ``RunAsUserName`` tests which could use this as well, with the difference that it would print the username instead of the UID.

The only thing is that we decided to centralize images that are ``[Conformance]`` related, while this isn't, AFAIK.
I hadn't seen this image before either; rolling it into the agnhost image would be trivial was my thought too but would be a separate issue and so I went ahead and documented it here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@# nonewprivs

A simple go app that prints the UID of the process running to test security context features.
